page.syntax: Context.Security.ChangeEmail as L (UserName as C, Email as C)

argument.name: L
argument.description: Return type, .T. if the user's email address was changed; otherwise .F.

page.description: Changes the email address for the user.
page.discussion: Context.Security.ChangeEmail() changes the email address for the user. Check Context.Security.CallResult.Success before using the return value.
